content:
Some of you may have heard but things are not going well with covid down here in Australia and New Zealand. But not everything is doon and gloom; someone is selling half a loaf of bread on New Zealand's well established 'trade me' web site:

https://www.trademe.co.nz/a/marketplace/home-living/food-beverage/fresh-produce/listing/3227634036?bof=T5c3S2KY

Do read the Q&A that comes with the auction

David Hay said:

It's sold! https://www.newshub.co.nz/home/lifestyle/2021/08/half-eaten-loaf-of-bread-sells-for-4000-becomes-fourth-most-popular-trade-me-listing-ever.html

I can't read this article. I don't understand what they mean "content not available in your region" since I am only exactly half a world away.
So much for antipodal solidarity
Weird, I was able to read it just last week, but now it's geofenced indeed!
